scripts.setup:unix: python3 -m venv venv && npm install -g yarn
scripts.run:unix: source venv/bin/activate; pip install -r requirements.txt; python core/main.py;
scripts.bootstrap:unix: source venv/bin/activate; pip install -r requirements.txt; deactivate;
scripts.compile: yarn run compile:ts && yarn run compile:scss
scripts.unix:big: npm install -g yarn && yarn install && npm run compile:scss && yarn tsc && python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python core/main.py && deactivate
scripts.win:big: npm install -g yarn && yarn install && pip install -r requirements.txt && npm run compile:scss && python core/main.py.
